snippet: The iPad becomes a child’s easel, thanks to ArtSee Studio from WowWee, designed to offer protection against drops and reduce the chance a preschooler might end up in your email.
abstract: The iPad becomes a child’s easel, thanks to ArtSee Studio from WowWee, designed to offer protection against drops and reduce the chance a preschooler might end up in your email.

headline.print_headline: Transforming an iPad to an Easel for Young Artists
